Name: Christine's Group
description:
Christine is 62 years old and has six children. She is a group leader and is representing her group of 13 farmers in Sirisia District, Kenya.

Christine has been farming with One Acre Fund for years now, having joined the program for the first time in 2011. This decision was largely a result of her desire to have access to quality training and acquire new farming methods and, although she described her last harvest as poor, she believes she could have a better one this year by continuing to work alongside One Acre Fund.

Christine also decided to purchase a solar light as part of her loan, which she is very excited about. It will allow her to reduce the consumption of paraffin fuel and therefore save more money.

Obtaining this loan means that Christine's group will be able to receive a total of nine solar lights, as well as farming inputs to plant a total of 11.5 acres.
